recommendations.title: Python for Everybody Specialization (University of Michigan)
recommendations.cost: Free to audit, Paid for certificate (approx. $49/month)
learning_outcomes: Understand fundamental programming concepts using Python
Write Python code to solve basic programming problems
Work with data using Python data structures (lists, dictionaries, tuples)
Implement and use Python modules and libraries
Gain experience in web scraping and data analysis
recommendations.reason_recommended: This specialization provides a comprehensive introduction to Python for beginners with no prior programming experience. It covers fundamental programming concepts, data structures, and web technologies, making it ideal for those looking to build a solid foundation in Python.
recommendations.best_for: Complete beginners who prefer structured learning with video lectures and hands-on exercises.

recommendations.title: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python, 2nd Edition
recommendations.cost: Free online, ~$25 for the physical book
learning_outcomes: Automate repetitive tasks using Python scripts
Work with files, directories, and text files
Control keyboard and mouse with Python
Web scrape data from websites
Send email and text messages with Python
recommendations.reason_recommended: This book is designed to teach Python programming skills through practical, real-world examples. It focuses on automating common tasks, making it highly engaging and immediately useful for those looking to improve their efficiency.
recommendations.best_for: Practical learners who want to quickly apply Python to solve real-world problems and automate daily tasks.

recommendations.title: Real Python
prerequisites: Basic understanding of programming concepts helpful, but not required
learning_outcomes: Master core Python concepts and best practices
Learn how to use popular Python libraries and frameworks
Develop professional-quality Python applications
Improve code readability and maintainability
Stay up-to-date with the latest Python trends and technologies
recommendations.reason_recommended: Real Python offers a vast library of high-quality tutorials, articles, and courses covering a wide range of Python topics from beginner to advanced.  The tutorials are well-written, practical, and constantly updated, making it an excellent resource for continuous learning.
recommendations.best_for: All skill levels seeking high-quality, in-depth tutorials and practical examples on various Python topics.

recommendations.title: Python Data Science Handbook: Essential Tools for Working with Data
prerequisites: Familiarity with fundamental data science concepts
learning_outcomes: Proficiently use NumPy for numerical computation
Master Pandas for data manipulation and analysis
Create informative data visualizations with Matplotlib
Apply Scikit-Learn for machine learning tasks
Understand and implement key data science workflows
recommendations.reason_recommended: This book provides a comprehensive guide to essential Python tools for data science, including NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-Learn. It is ideal for those looking to apply Python to data analysis, machine learning, and scientific computing.
recommendations.best_for: Individuals with a basic understanding of Python and data science who want to develop expertise in using Python for data analysis and machine learning.

recommendations.title: Django Girls Tutorial
learning_outcomes: Build a simple web application using Django
Understand the basics of web development with Python
Learn about models, views, and templates in Django
Deploy a web application to the internet
Gain experience in working with HTML, CSS, and Python
recommendations.reason_recommended: Django Girls is a fantastic resource for beginners looking to learn web development with Python and Django. The tutorial guides you through building a simple blog application, providing hands-on experience with the Django framework and fundamental web development concepts.
recommendations.best_for: Beginners interested in web development who want a hands-on introduction to Django and web application creation.
